Reviews.Title: The best deal in town
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Ferro
Reviews.Content: I've ben shopping for something similari for a while. The pro shops in my area recommend this hybrid model, now I know why! I agree this was quite a catch. The lot of accessories that came with the camera made it even more worthwhile. I'm quite proud of this purchase. Vendor was also quite amicable, responded quickly to a concern I had pertaining to the delivery which was in fact made in record time!

ProductInfo.Features:
Samsung NX300 Mirrorless Digital Camera with 20-50mm F/3.5-5.6 ED II Lens (Black)
0.45X Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD)
32GB Memory Card + High Speed Memory Card Reader + Extended Life Replacement Battery + AC/DC Rapid Home & Travel Charger
Standard Slave Flash + Mini HDMI Cable
Full Size Tripod + Monopod + Table Top Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NX300 Mirrorless Digital Camera with 20-50mm F/3.5-5.6 ED II Lens (Black). Includes: 0.45X Wide Angle Lens, 2X Telephoto, 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD), 32GB Memory Card, Tripod, Monopod, Carrying Case & More
